api_list.name: Search Shop List
Shop Product List(H5 Version)

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description:
_coefp :综合排序(Default)
_sale :销量排序(Sales)
first_new :新品排序(New)
bid :价格升序(Price Asc)
_bid :价格降序(Price Desc)

api_list.name: Shop Product List(Global Version)

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description:
__default :综合(Default)
sales_des :销量优先(Sales)
new_des :新品优先(New)
credit_des :信用优先(Credit)
price_asc :价格升序(Price Asc)
price_des :价格降序(Price Desc)

api_list.name: Product Info(App Version)
